scripts.start: budo index.js:bundle.js -H 0.0.0.0 -p 8080 -- -t brfs -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o bundle.css ]
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:sw && npm run build:js
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html manifest.json dist && cp -R assets/* dist && cp -R content dist
scripts.build:js: browserify -p tinyify -t brfs -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o dist/bundle.css ] -e index.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo "blog.yerkopalma.me" > dist/CNAME && gh-pages -d dist
